tooltip.queen_bee.stinger_sword: When antenna is equipped, Shift + Right click to summon a friendly bee that will give you and nearby friends the regeneration effect. Also, this sword inflicts poison and nausea.
tooltip.queen_bee.antenna: When equipped bees will never aggro on you.
advancement.queen_bee.im_the_queen.title: I'm The Queen
advancement.queen_bee.im_the_queen.descr: Defeat Queen Bee and get her antennas
advancement.queen_bee.root.title: Queen Bee Mod
